title: Candy Coated Milk Chocolate Pieces Cookies I

content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 1/2 cups candy-coated milk chocolate pieces" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "375 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "190 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Thoroughly cream together shortening, sugars, eggs and vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "cream"@14:19 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "shortening"@29:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "sugars"@41:47 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
		)
		:ppt ( ing-3 "eggs"@49:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "vanilla"@58:65 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) In a separate bowl, mix together the dry ingredients, except the candies.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "mix"@23:26 / AC
		:ppt ( "the dry ingredients"@36:55 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-5 )
			:ref ( ing-6 )
			:ref ( ing-7 )
		)
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a separate bowl"@6:21 / TOOL )
		:todo ( "except the candies"@57:75 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Add to creamed mixture and mix well.
6) Drop by teaspoon onto cookie sheets and decorate with remaining candies.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Drop"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( "teaspoon"@11:19 / OTHER )
		:gol ( tool-6-0 "cookie sheets"@25:38 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "decorate"@43:51 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "remaining candies"@57:74 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
